H0.text: Whose beagle buddy is 'Snoopy'. Charlie Brown

H1.text: Whose beagle buddy is 'Snoopy'. Linus van Pelt

H2.text: Whose beagle buddy is 'Snoopy'. Lucy van Pelt

A4.text: Snoopy is very relieved to see a 'NO DOGS ALLOWED' sign and returns to live with Charlie Brown.

A5.text: Snoopy has a rivalry with Linus Van Pelt over the latter's blanket.
